panels.title: PSPDFKit worker requests per second by type (pod = $pod)

targets.expr: sum by(status) (rate(http_server_request_duration_microseconds_count{group="long_poll", host=~"$pod", namespace=~"$namespace", app=~"$app", family=~"pspdfkit-document-engine"}[1m]))

custom.axisLabel: Please ignore unit on axis, it is stacked to 100%

targets.expr: sum by(request) (delta(pspdfkitd_exec_duration_milliseconds_sum{host=~"$pod", namespace=~"$namespace", app=~"$app", family=~"pspdfkit-document-engine", request!="checkout"}[5m]))

panels.title: PSPDFKit worker % spent on each request per 5 minute (pod = $pod)

targets.expr: max by(status) (http_server_request_duration_microseconds{quantile="${quantiles:raw}", group="standard", status!~"5..", host=~"$pod", namespace=~"$namespace", app=~"$app", family=~"pspdfkit-document-engine"})

max by(status) (http_server_request_duration_microseconds{quantile="${quantiles:raw}", group="standard", status=~"5..", host=~"$pod", namespace=~"$namespace", app=~"$app", family=~"pspdfkit-document-engine"})

max by(status) (http_server_request_duration_microseconds{quantile="${quantiles:raw}", group="standard", status=~"5..", host=~"$pod", namespace=~"$namespace", app=~"$app", family=~"pspdfkit-document-engine"})
max by(status) (http_server_req_end{quantile="${quantiles:raw}", group="standard", status=~"5..", host=~"$pod", namespace=~"$namespace", app=~"$app", family=~"pspdfkit-document-engine"})
max by(request) (pspdfkitd_exec_duration_milliseconds{app=~"$app", quantile="${quantiles:raw}", host=~"$pod", namespace=~"$namespace", app=~"$app", family=~"pspdfkit-document-engine"})

panels.title: Quantile $quantiles max processing time per request (pod = $pod)

panels.description: This represents the time spent waiting for free worker
panels.title: Quantile $quantiles max queue time PSPDFKit worker (pod = $pod)

targets.expr: max(assets_fetch_asset{app=~"$app", quantile="${quantiles:raw}", host=~"$pod", namespace=~"$namespace", app=~"$app", family=~"pspdfkit-document-engine"})
max(assets_store_asset{app=~"$app", quantile="${quantiles:raw}", host=~"$pod", namespace=~"$namespace", app=~"$app", family=~"pspdfkit-document-engine"})

panels.title: Quantile $quantiles max Store asset storage time (pod = $pod)

targets.expr: cache_fs_miss{host=~"$pod", namespace=~"$namespace", app=~"$app", family=~"pspdfkit-document-engine"} / cache_fs_hit{host=~"$pod", namespace=~"$namespace", app=~"$app", family=~"pspdfkit-document-engine"}

panels.description: Time waiting for DB connection from pool
panels.title: PostgreSQL Connection Pool Queue Time

panels.description: Time to checkout worker for HTTP/2 streaming
panels.title: HTTP/2 Worker Checkout Time

panels.description: HTTP/2 render process creation vs reuse
panels.title: HTTP/2 Render Process Creation

panels.description: Latency to start receiving remote document
panels.title: Remote Document - Time to First Byte

panels.description: Total time to download remote document
panels.title: Remote Document - Total Download Time
